commentBody:
Actually, perhaps Bill Belichik argued with Chandler Jones over whatever Chandler ingested and then got popped in the eye? Rob Gronkowski then fell over laughing and hurt his knee?

The NFL is rife with player misbehavior, coaching mishaps and dirty tricks perpetrated by those who want to win at any cost. While I live in Boston I am a Jets fan (woe to me) but all this buzz is really kind of silly. All that matters happens on the field during four quarters of football. The rest, sorry NYT, is a non-story.
